item.title: Something Fabulous
item.description: So far the theme of the year is romances that I read and then re-read right away and install on my best-of-year list (best-of-ever list too, in the case of Something Fabulous, which more than lives up to its name).

item.title: On the Fox Roads
item.description: Nghi Vo can write queer Jazz Age fanfic for me all day any day. (Also excellent: the Venn diagram of her Chinese and Vietnamese characters, the overlapping similarities and the differences.
